float32.name: Room Intensity High Frequency
float32.tooltip: intensity of the room effect above the reference high frequency

float32.name: Room Rolloff
float32.tooltip: (0 To 10) how quickly the room effect rolls off, from 0.0 to 10.0

float32.name: High Frequency Reference
float32.tooltip: (20 To 20,000) for hf values, what frequency defines hf, from 20 to 20,000

plugin.comment: Use these values for WWise reverb. Above stuff will be removed eventually.

stringid.name: Environment Name
stringid.tooltip: Name of the environment from WWise. This will be a DSP effect with Environmental Effect checked.

float32.name: Dry Mix Value
float32.tooltip: 0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

float32.name: Wet Mix Value
float32.tooltip: 0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

float32.name: Player Wet Mix Value
float32.tooltip: 0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

plugin.comment: This will override obstruction and occlusion if you set the cutoff frequency to a non-zero value. Use the individual classes' "forced lowpass wet mix" value to alter the mix.
